title: New Oakley Kato conforms to your face with frameless lens & unique nose wrap
content:
Oakley is known for pushing boundaries. “Normal” shades just aren’t their thing. Now, after 45 years of “disruptive innovation”, they’ve just launched their next wild look – the Kato. Just as noteworthy at the Kato itself is the way that Oakley launched the new glasses – from augmented VR to reality. Oakley’s key athletes all […]

The post New Oakley Kato conforms to your face with frameless lens & unique nose wrap appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
